import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { SearchBar } from './SearchBar'; import { SearchResultsList } from './SearchResultsList'; const styles = { btnCircle: { borderRadius: '50%', width: '40px', // Adjust the size as needed height: '40px', // Adjust the size as needed padding: '1px', // Adjust the padding as needed backgroundImage: 'url("/Users/shreeyapatil/React_E-Commerce/mic.jpg")', backgroundSize: 'cover', }, }; const Navbar = () => { const [results, setResults] = useState([]); const state = useSelector((state) => state.handleCart); return (
Grocery Shopping
  • Home
  • Products
  • About
  • Contact
Cart ({state.length})
Search Your Items here
{/* Display search results using SearchResultsList */} {results && results.length > 0 && }
); }; export default Navbar;
